duties_responsibilities.duty: Visually inspect vehicles, question customers, and complete service work orders.
Interact with customers to determine immediate service needs and educate them on services and products.
Serve as a liaison between technicians and customers, providing excellent customer service.
Answer phone calls in a timely manner, screening and forwarding as applicable.

education_certification.credential: High School Diploma, Current valid driver’s license, and the ability to operate an automobile.
